At the income data collection: a sample of approximately 14.800 households randomly selected from the 2630 election districts in 505 settlements included in the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) Unified Population Data Collection System sample. With surveys of mobility and prestige: a non-proportionally stratified sample of individuals. By dwellings, with KSH sampling.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
